articles.title: Desktop Survivors 98 is more than just a retro Windows nostalgia trip - Ars Technica
articles.description: Tight mouse controls and inventive weapons build on a loving old-school computing homage.

articles.title: Diablo 4 Season 9 Will Let Players Build Their Own Spells - GameSpot
articles.description: Improvements to Nightmare dungeons, a new boss fight, and timed mini-dungeons are also on deck.
articles.content:
Ahead of Diablo 4 Season 9's arrival on the game's public-test server on May 27, Blizzard has revealed players will be able to build their own spells next season.
